menu.title: "Fitness"
menu.description: Menu "Fitness" is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. For people, who are interested in sports and want to be active and healthy. This is a brand new product with the best price and high quality

menu.title: "Premium"
menu.description: Menu “Premium” - we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - a restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!

menu.title: "Lenten"
menu.description: Our special "Lenten Menu" is a careful selection of ingredients: the complete absence of products animal origin. Complete harmony with yourself and nature in every element! Everything will be Om!

menu.title: "Balanced"
menu.description: The "Balanced" menu is the compliance of your diet with all scientific recommendations. We carefully calculate your needs for c / b / w / y and create the best dishes for you.
